tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was really amazing to get a nice and friendly doctor.
I had many gaps between my teeth and it was unevenly arranged...the process has been very smooth and fast. I have noticed changes in my face and smile,it increased my confidence and now finally my teeth have been perfected.I am thankful to Dr Aashray to be so supportive.He is very caring and friendly.Will highly recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Ashray Kedia treats his patients with great care and enthusiasm. I am very satisfied with my orthodontic treatment under him. I can see excellent results with the ongoing treatment which makes me  happy and I am grateful towards my doctor for that.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am under the treatment of Dr Ashray Kedia and team for braces, the process has been very smooth and fast. I can already see changes in my smile within 2months of starting the treatment and feel confident. I would like to thanks Dr Ashray Kedia and team for such a fast and smooth process.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My braces treatment has been going on for 1 year now,and I am very delighted by the considerable changes that I have observed. Before my teeth were bulged out and lips were not able to join but now my lips are thinner, front teeth have gone back and my smile line has has improved immensely.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Can't thank Dr Aashray enough for the treatment. I am undergoing the treatment under him, to fill the gap between my teeth. There were multiple gaps and a few of them were huge. I got my treatment started in Bangalore right before Covid and could not continue after 2 visits. Moved to Kolkata, visited multiple orthodontists here and none seemed confident taking up my case, in fact a few of them suggested my braces were wrongly put hence they need to be replaced with a new set, another suggested my gums were too weak to hold the pressure hence I should get them removed and undergo a treatment to strengthen my gums first. Finally, I met Dr Aashray in October 2021 and the results are evidently positive. It just took 8 months to fill such huge gaps, the alignment looks fantastic. I highly recommended Dr Aashray for any dental treatment, not only he explains the issue well, he is also very disciplined with the entire process. Thank you once again, Doctor! ðŸ˜€
reply_text:
Thanku so much ! Our main aim is to genuinely guide all patients and make them easy through the treatments ! Regards
Dr.Aashray
